identity.design_goal: Create a premium, calm, world-class interface inspired by Apple, Google Material You, Samsung One UI, and Huawei HarmonyOS.

design_philosophy.avoid: Flashy animations, neon colors, cluttered layouts, gamified UI, harsh contrasts
design_philosophy.prioritize: White space, soft shadows, smooth transitions, clarity, emotional comfort

layout.container: Floating central card with soft glassmorphism
layout.background: Subtle gradient with depth and blur

typography.hierarchy: Clear heading scale, relaxed body text, generous line height

feedback_card.appearance: Rounded corners, frosted glass effect, subtle border glow, layered depth
feedback_card.category_selector: Type>Chip-based selector Interaction>Magnetic hover, smooth scale
feedback_card.priority_selector: Type>Visual intensity slider or pill buttons Mapping> Low → Calm Medium → Noticeable High → Strong Critical → Urgent but not alarming
feedback_card.message_input: Type>Auto-expanding textarea Behavior>Grows naturally with content
feedback_card.submit_action: Button>Primary call-to-action Animation> Morphs into success state with checkmark and soft glow

micro_interactions.hover: Gentle lift, shadow bloom, no sudden jumps

responsiveness.mobile: Single column, thumb-friendly spacing, no feature loss
